Package GUIElements

Class ScrollBar

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.ScrollBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustmentListener, EventListener
public class ScrollBar
extends GUIElement
implements AdjustmentListener
Class that implements a scrollbar. This is a GUIElement composed of two bars. One to show the total length of the GUIElement it is attached to, and one to show the length of the visible part of the GUIElement. This last one is dragable to move the viewed part.

    • getScrollBarRatio

      public double getScrollBarRatio()
      Returns a number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating where the small bar is positioned. 0.0 means the beginning of the small bar is at the left side of the big bar. The bigger the number the more the small bar is positioned to the right . 1.0 will never be reached because the beginning of the small bar can never be completely moved to the right side of the big bar.

    • getBigBarSize

      public double getBigBarSize()
      Return the size of the big bar.
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • updateCorrectSmallBarSize

      public void updateCorrectSmallBarSize​(int totalSize, int viewableSize)
      Update the size of the small bar. It is equal to: (viewable size of the content) / (total size of all content) * size scrollbar
      Parameters:
      totalSize -
      viewableSize -
